languages.text: "Смотрю, как горит правосудие. Мое правосудие". {n}Соломон смотрит в пламя. Вид у него не скорбный, а скорее задумчивый.{/n}
"Watching justice burn. My justice." {n}Solomorne watches the fire, his expression more contemplative than mournful.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Смотрю, как горит правосудие. Мое правосудие". {n}Соломон смотрит в пламя. Вид у него не скорбный, а скорее задумчивый.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Watching justice burn. My justice." {n}Solomorne watches the fire, his expression more contemplative than mournful.{/n}
"Watching justice burn. My justice." {n}Solomorne watches the fire, his expression more contemplative than mournful.{/n}

"Watching justice burn. My justice." {n}Solomorne watches the fire, his expression more contemplative than mournful.{/n}

languages.text: 「正義が燃えるのを見ています。私の正義が」{n}ソロモーンは火を見つめている。悲しみよりもむしろ考え込んでいるような表情をしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watching justice burn. My justice." {n}Solomorne watches the fire, his expression more contemplative than mournful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「正義が燃えるのを見ています。私の正義が」{n}ソロモーンは火を見つめている。悲しみよりもむしろ考え込んでいるような表情をしていた。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich sehe zu, wie die Gerechtigkeit verbrennt. Meine Gerechtigkeit." {n}Solomorne betrachtet das Feuer mit eher nachdenklichem als betrübtem Ausdruck.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watching justice burn. My justice." {n}Solomorne watches the fire, his expression more contemplative than mournful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe zu, wie die Gerechtigkeit verbrennt. Meine Gerechtigkeit." {n}Solomorne betrachtet das Feuer mit eher nachdenklichem als betrübtem Ausdruck.{/n}

languages.text: « Je regarde la justice brûler. Ma justice. » {n}Le regard perdu dans les flammes, Solomorne affiche une expression plus contemplative qu'affligée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watching justice burn. My justice." {n}Solomorne watches the fire, his expression more contemplative than mournful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je regarde la justice brûler. Ma justice. » {n}Le regard perdu dans les flammes, Solomorne affiche une expression plus contemplative qu'affligée.{/n}

languages.text: «Ver cómo arde la justicia. Mi justicia». {n}Solomorne contempla las llamas con una expresión más contemplativa que afligida.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watching justice burn. My justice." {n}Solomorne watches the fire, his expression more contemplative than mournful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ver cómo arde la justicia. Mi justicia». {n}Solomorne contempla las llamas con una expresión más contemplativa que afligida.{/n}

languages.text: “看着正义熊熊燃烧，我的正义。”{n}索罗蒙看着火光，他的表情没有太多悲伤，更像是在沉思。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watching justice burn. My justice." {n}Solomorne watches the fire, his expression more contemplative than mournful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看着正义熊熊燃烧，我的正义。”{n}索罗蒙看着火光，他的表情没有太多悲伤，更像是在沉思。{/n}

languages.text: "Adaletimin yanıp kül oluşunu seyrediyorum." {n}Solomorne, kederlice değil de düşüncelere dalmış şekilde alevleri izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watching justice burn. My justice." {n}Solomorne watches the fire, his expression more contemplative than mournful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Adaletimin yanıp kül oluşunu seyrediyorum." {n}Solomorne kederlice değil de düşüncelere dalmış şekilde alevleri izler.{/n}
